data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: In casual play, the right to deal a hand typically rotates among the players and is marked by a token called a dealer button (or buck). In a casino, a ____ dealer ____ the ____ for ____ hand, but ____ button ( typically a white ____ disk ) is ____ clockwise ____ the ____ to ____ a ____ dealer ____ determine ____ order ____ betting. The cards are dealt clockwise around the poker table, one at a time.
data.partBlankContent: In casual play, the right to deal a hand typically rotates among the players and is marked by a token called a dealer button (or buck). In a casino, a ho___ dealer han____ the ca___ for ea__ hand, but t__ button ( typically a white pla____ disk ) is rot____ clockwise am___ the pla____ to indi____ a nom____ dealer t_ determine t__ order o_ betting. The cards are dealt clockwise around the poker table, one at a time.
data.answer: 在休闲游戏中，发牌权通常在玩家之间轮换，并由一个称为发牌按钮(或buck)的标记标记。在赌场中，庄家负责每一手牌，但按钮(通常是一个白色塑料盘)在玩家之间顺时针旋转，以指示名义上的庄家来决定投注顺序。纸牌按顺时针方向在牌桌上发，一次一张。
